tutorials.title: Lab 3: Install and prepare prerequisites
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to set up the GitHub Development Environment, and install GitHub Desktop.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Autonomous JSON Database & SODA Collections
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to set up the GitHub Development Environment, and install GitHub Desktop.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Build an OracleJET Web Application
tutorials.description: This lab describes the prescribed folder structure that we need follow for developing labs and workshops.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Build NodeJS APIs
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to develop your lab (markdown) content using an editor, such as **Atom** and starting the atom-live-server.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Integration with Oracle Digital Assistant and Slack
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to integrate Slack and Oracle Digital Assistant into your application.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Deploy the application on OKE
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to deploy the application using OKE.

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Set up the Development Environment
tutorials.description: Put it all together in one single application.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
